problem_text:
Let P be a maximal parabolic subgroup of the smallest index in a finite group G of Lie type E6, E7, E8, or 2E6 and let X be a subgroup such that PX = G. Is it true that X = G?
V. D. Mazurov
answer: Yes, it is true (mod CFSG) (C. Hering, M. W. Liebeck, J. Saxl, J. Algebra, 106, no. 2 (1987), 517–527).
